attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It has been shown quite clearly that this government does not listen to its people.

Examples: The Iraq war, EU referendum...

Why should taxpayers money be wasted further on this E-Petition system when it is quite clear that the government will not act upon any of these petitions?  It is a waste of funding, and it is simply a 'feel good' factor to us, the voters, that we 'have a say'.

We are not living in a true democracy - my voice is not heard by the government, so why waste money under this false assumption?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
